name: BBQMate
0:
”Alexa, open Barbeque Mate and tell me the target temperature for medium rare”
”Alexa, open Barbeque Mate and tell me how to make a simple rub”
”Alexa, open Barbeque Mate and tell me how to cook a pork steak”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: barbeque mate
des: BBQ Mate is a small companion skill to help you on your way to having a great cook. From internal steak temperatures, to a dead simple dry rub recipe, this skill will help achieve amazing results at the pit!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
